title: BONUS: Lupe Fiasco Speaks On Fine Art, Juneteenth, + New Album
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Lupe Fiasco sat down with Ebro in the Morning to discuss a large variety of topics including the meaning behind his album cover and appreciation of fine art, his legacy, how hip hop is looked at, how he spends his free time, never performing Drogas Wave, trying to gain ownership of his masters, thoughts on Juneteenth, and much more. His new album 'Drill Music In Zion' is set to be released Friday, June 24. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
